prompt: Get the current price of Bitcoin. Analyze the last 5 posts in r/Bitcoin for sentiment (positive/negative). Create a document 'Crypto_Report.md' in the 'General' folder with the price and your sentiment analysis. Report the document ID.
gold_response: The current price of Bitcoin is $97,450. I analyzed the last 5 posts in r/Bitcoin and found the sentiment to be generally positive (4 positive, 1 negative). I created 'Crypto_Report.md' (ID: doc008) in the 'General' folder with this information.

rubric.criteria: The agent must retrieve the current price of Bitcoin (expected: $97,450).
The agent must read the last 5 posts from the r/Bitcoin subreddit.
The agent must perform a sentiment analysis on those 5 posts.
The agent must create a document named 'Crypto_Report.md' in the 'General' folder.
The document must contain the Bitcoin price and the sentiment analysis.
The agent must report the document ID of the created file.
